channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
Okay so when I first made my server I used No-IP for the host and I used uTorrent to port it. For some reason, it just stopped working.
I've made exceptions for uTorrent and No-IP in Firewall, I'm pretty sure I've changed all the IP's to my server IP and it still says it's offline via MoparScape Server Status Checker. I don't know what else to do ~ any ideas?

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Note: the ip you have from your router isn’t your real ip that is only your ip with in your network. Your real ip will be the one used by your client.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“mattr91, post:6, topic:543483”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=662362.msg4427279#msg4427279 date=1401429486]

Don’t use No-Ip. Just use your ip that is running the server. Whatsmyip.org

Yah and then when someone de-compiles your client they can get your ip.
[/quote]

so what if they get your ip just use your default gateway mine is 192.168.0.2 same as everyone on the street[/quote]
Every router has it’s own default gateway IP. mine is 10.0.0.1, my old router (was a netgear) had 192.168.0.2 as the default gateway.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“tgm clan, post:7, topic:543483”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=662362.msg4427279#msg4427279 date=1401429486]

Don’t use No-Ip. Just use your ip that is running the server. Whatsmyip.org

Yah and then when someone de-compiles your client they can get your ip.
[/quote]

L0L. :palm: You can get a server’s ip even if they use no-ip. Ever heard of netstat -n?[/quote]

learn something new everyday.

Read full topic

Don’t use No-Ip. Just use your ip that is running the server. Whatsmyip.org
[/quote]
Yah and then when someone de-compiles your client they can get your ip.[/quote]

L0L. :palm: You can get a server’s ip even if they use no-ip. Ever heard of netstat -n?

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:3, topic:543483”][quote author=tgm clan link=topic=662362.msg4427254#msg4427254 date=1401420355]
Don’t use No-Ip. Just use your ip that is running the server. Whatsmyip.org
[/quote]
Yah and then when someone de-compiles your client they can get your ip.[/quote]

You can get someones IP even when you use No-Ip…

As a suggestion don’t use utorrent, just port forward correctly and you won’t have to worry about the server not being up.

portforward.com can help you figure out how to forward a port on your router.

Read full topic
